name: No Fish In The Sea
description:
What's this? - 
This is my entry for the Minijam 91, 
Developed in under 3 Days, No Fish In The Sea is an
arcade action game with bullet-hell traits where you have to fish UFOs in order to make score.

Music - 
Music originally composed by Hiroshi Kawaguchi for Space Harrier.
Metal arrange by the awesome Friedrich Habetler.
Music mashup and in-game procedural blend made by me

Hints- 
The sensitive element against bullets is the character

Extra-
The Character's name is "Slimy"
